selected_quotes: Scientists have devised a new portable device for transporting lungs for transplant
Normothermic perfusion of donor lungs for preservation and assessment with the Organ Care System Lun
Normothermic perfusion of donor lungs Teknik för att bevara lungor inför transplantation.
Revolutionizing lung transplant procedures with portable perfusion system
Keeping it warm: new device helps lung preservation

citation.abstract: Cold flush and static cold storage is the standard preservation technique for donor lungs before transplantations. Several research groups have assessed normothermic perfusion of donor lungs but all devices investigated were non-portable. We report first-in-man experience of the portable Organ Care System (OCS) Lung device for concomitant preservation, assessment, and transport of donor lungs.
citation.title: Normothermic perfusion of donor lungs for preservation and assessment with the Organ Care System Lung before bilateral transplantation: a pilot study of 12 patients

news.title: ‘Organ Care System,’ Medical Device, Allows Lungs To ‘Breathe’ Outside Body Before Transplant
news.summary: The Organ Care System is a new form of technology that allows lungs to continue breathing while outside the body, which will improve the transplantation process.

news.title: 'Lungs in a Box' could breath new life into lung transplants
news.summary: The medical company TransMedics, in collaboration with Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical, devised an innovative technology that allows human lungs to continue to function before being transplanted into a patient.

news.title: 'Beating Heart in a Box'...
news.summary: New organ transport devices could as much as double or triple the number of successful transplant procedures.
